name: business-elements
description: JavaScript HTTP client for the Business Elements API.

scripts.dist: mkdir -p dist && rm -f dist/*.* && npm run dist-dev && npm run dist-noshim && npm run dist-prod
scripts.dist-noshim: browserify -s BusinessElementsClient -g uglifyify --ignore isomorphic-fetch --ignore event-source-polyfill --ignore babel-polyfill -e src/index.js -o dist/business-elements-client.noshim.js -t [ babelify --sourceMapRelative . ]
scripts.dist-prod: browserify -s BusinessElementsClient -g uglifyify -e src/index.js -o dist/business-elements-client.min.js -t [ babelify --sourceMapRelative . ]
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-nocover
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run test && npm run dist

author: Product Foundry <contact@product-foundry.com>
